thread.title: Colorado Buffaloes lose ILB Addison Gillam for season
thread.title_full: Colorado Buffaloes lose ILB Addison Gillam for season

title: Colorado Buffaloes lose ILB Addison Gillam for season
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
Colorado inside linebacker Addison Gillam will have surgery for a second time this fall on his injured knee and is out for the season....
